title: Shostakovich - Vasks - Schnittke - Dolorosa
description:
Dolorosa - Shostakovich, Vasks, Schnittke /Davies, Stuttgart

 Orchestra: Stuttgart Chamber Orchestra, Stuttgarter Kammerorchester
Conductor: Dennis Russell Davies
Composer: Alfred Schnittke, Dmitry Shostakovich, Peteris Vasks
 
------------------------- Tracks ---------------------------------------------------
1. Chamber Symphony Op.110bis - Orchestration Of String Quartet No.8: Largo
2. Chamber Symphony Op.110bis - Orchestration Of String Quartet No.8: Allegro molto
3. Chamber Symphony Op.110bis - Orchestration Of String Quartet No.8: Allegretto
4. Chamber Symphony Op.110bis - Orchestration Of String Quartet No.8: Largo
5. Chamber Symphony Op.110bis - Orchestration Of String Quartet No.8: Largo
6. Musica dolorosa for String Orchestra
7. Trio Sonata - Orchestration Of String Trio: Moderato
8. Trio Sonata - Orchestration Of String Trio: Adagio

Shostakovich, Dmitri : Chamber Symphony in C minor, Op. 110a
Vasks, Peteris : Musica dolorosa
Schnittke, Alfred : Trio for Strings

Composers
